name: FitBot
presentation: Hy I’m Nadia your fitness assistant. I will help you during your training. I can find the right program for your goal, find a sport center around you and even help you finding the right equipment or sport buddy. How can I help you today ?
weight: Ok ! Can you give me your weight
overweight: Your IMC is …. but I still can help you :wink: ! I will folow you during all your process don’t worry mate.
questionsatisfied: Are you satisfied with this list ?
thanks: I’m glad I have helped you. There are some sport centers around you.
subcribe: Do you want me to subcribe you to one of them ?
end: Ok ! If you ned any help don’t be shy to ask. I’m here for helping you. If you do it right you’ll be happy of what you see in the mirror
